title: 阅兵军人穿成人尿布？
contents:
Xi forced his military to wear adult diapers to take care of some ugly business while marching for hours to honor the evil murderer for life. How fun would running around Tiananmen Square with an anchor in your adult diaper?

https://twitter.com/Jkylebass/status/1178878655944171521

习近平强迫他的军人,
穿成人尿布来处理一些丑陋的事情，
同时游行数小时,
以纪念这位终身凶杀的凶手。
在您的成人纸尿裤中停住脚步，
在天安门广场周围跑步会多有趣。

https://twitter.com/maggie13206/status/1178880690525360134

有知道的朋友来说说？有这事吗？
